description: High HVAC consumption despite low occupancy.
recommended_action: Investigate HVAC system for potential malfunctions or inefficient operation.

description: High consumption detected that is 1.19 times the hourly average with non-zero occupancy.
recommended_action: Investigate possible inefficiencies or misuse of energy.

description: Higher consumption than usual with higher occupancy
recommended_action: Investigate the cause for increased energy consumption. Check HVAC, lighting, and other appliances.

description: High energy consumption (1.99x) detected during a period of increased occupancy.
recommended_action: Investigate the cause for this increase in energy consumption to determine if there are any malfunctions or wasteful situations.

description: High consumption (1.44x higher than hourly average) with normal occupancy
recommended_action: Investigate potential energy inefficiencies or unnecessary load.

description: High energy consumption (2.35x) detected during non-peak occupancy hours.
recommended_action: Investigate the cause of high energy consumption during non-peak occupancy hours.

description: High energy consumption (2.21x higher than hourly average) observed at the current time with normal occupancy.
recommended_action: Investigate possible causes for increased energy consumption and implement corrective measures as necessary.
